overview.en: Pundi X (NPXS) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Pundi X has a current supply of 258,498,693,019.07 with 236,379,908,114.9478 in circulation. The last known price of Pundi X is 0.00819475 USD and is up 23.89 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 56 active market(s) with $2,431,205,931.47 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://pundix.com/.
